Description.Text: Found on the breathtaking Big Island coastline near beaches, shopping, golf and adventures, our gorgeous villa resort provides a premium vacation experience. Guests enjoy spectacular views and on-site activities, including tennis courts, pools, and hot tubs.

From Kona International Airport: Head out of the airport on Kupipi St, then take a slight left toward Keahole Airport Rd. Continue on Keahole Airport Rd until you reach HI-19/Queen Kaahumanu Highway. Turn right onto the highway and drive 9.7 miles, then continue onto HI-11. In 2 miles, turn right onto Kamehameha III Rd. Drive 1.5 miles and then turn left onto Alii Dr. Drive 0.9 miles and then turn right onto Kaleiopapa St. Our resort is on your left at 78-7190 Kaleiopapa Street on the Kona Coast, HI.

Holua Resort at Mauna Loa Village is ideally located near a number of dining options serving all types of fare, including American and Hawaiian cuisine. Here are just a few of your Kona restaurant choices: Kenichi Pacific Huggo's Fine Dining Don the Beachcomber Bubba Gump Shrimp Company Kona Brewing Company
